snippet.title: New Super Mario bros Impending Doom 2024 Trailer!
snippet.description:
Disclaimer: We are not associated with Nintendo or the newer team. This is a fan mod made with pure passion for the game. That meaning that we aren't making any money off of this mod 
and it's just for the community to enjoy

Make sure to join our discord! https://discord.gg/QuUfgU9NDt
Check out our music here: https://www.youtube.com/@ImpendingDoomCollective

FAQ:
When will Impending Doom release?
As of now there is no official release date. A good way to keep up with this mod is to stay up to date on our discord server which you can find here: https://discord.gg/QuUfgU9NDt

When will the next trailer be?
We normally don't ever plan when our trailers will come out until last minute. Instead we just get a lot done and then see what we want to put in the trailer.

Does this mod feature the frog suit
Most likely yes. As of now behind the scenes it is a little buggy but we hope to fix all of its issues in the end so it can finally see the light of day.

How many worlds and levels does impending doom have?
So far we plan to have 8 worlds with no bonus worlds. That can always change. Also there is no confirmed level count yet

Can I download a wbfs/iso of this hack?
No, we are legally not allowed to give out an iso or a wbfs file of this mod when it releases. That is considered piracy. If you wish to play this game on dolphin emulator you need to find your own iso builder.

Can I play this on Wii U?
You can play this mod on both the Wii and the Virtual Wii on the Wii U

If you have any more questions, make sure to ask a mod or a dev in the qna chat on our discord server!


Check out our main channels: 
Jaker: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqE7ybRxN8VdCAhU-oNyAHA
Drex: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLqftWZ1ndIMkPKQwsxKwJw
Synel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCle8WuJ1NrVg1N8niuP8-rw


#ImpendingDoom #Nsmbw #MarioBros
